instruction: Please provide an overview of the main driver of the MSCI ACWI ESG Index performance in 2021.
output: The main driver of the MSCI ACWI ESG Index performance in 2021 was stock selection, as evidenced by the exhibit provided. The COVID-19 pandemic brought about major changes in consumer demand, supply chains, and workforce productivity, which companies were required to navigate successfully. Those companies that were able to adapt to these new changes performed well in 2021.
